title: I can't sign in to support, and im missing a dsetup.dll
body: I can't sign in to support and im missing the dsetup.dll

replies.body:
It may not actually be missing, but a security setting might be blocked from reading it.  Start out with the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your OS or antivirus isn't blocking you from accessing game files.  

If you're still unable to access the support site, you can also reach out to us directly via support@riotgames.com.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KOs7HptN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-26T22:39:43.434+0000)
>
> It may not actually be missing, but a security setting might be blocked from reading it.  Start out with the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your OS or antivirus isn't blocking you from accessing game files.  
> 
> If you're still unable to access the support site, you can also reach out to us directly via support@riotgames.com.

Its unable to find the dsetup.dll in the download file for DirectX Setup

In that case, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs to get more context.  Attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will look into this with you to figure out what's going on.  We'll see you there!
